encode_text: A black bear is walking in the grass.
decode_text_left: A Minecraft-inspired rendering of a black bear walking in the grass, featuring distinct pixelated textures, blocky 3D cube structures, limited color palette with no gradients, sharp right angles and perfect squares, characteristic voxel-based terrain with visible block edges
decode_text_right: A Van Gogh-style painting of a black bear walking in the grass, with bold, swirling brushstrokes, rich textures, and vibrant, expressive colors reminiscent of Starry Night.
decode_text: A van gogh style painting on the left and a minecraft style painting on the right of a black bear walking in the grass.
